original_title: Court issues order against holding protest in Maradana area
original_body_lines: The Maligakanda Magistrate issued an order preventing 11 persons including Duminda Nagamuwa and others accompanying them from engaging in protests or demonstrations in several areas in the Maradana Police area including Deans Road, Kinsey Road and roads close to the National Hospital Square causing inconvenience to the public and motorists from 10.30 am today till 10.00 am tomorrow.

The Maradana Police has requested the Maligakanda Magistrate that a group of protesters was planning to hold a protest demonstration starting from National Hospital to Lipton Circus and the OIC of the Maradana Police has requested the Magistrate to issue an order preventing the protest march.

Accordingly, the Magistrate ordered the protesters not to protest opposite the Bandaranaike Building, Accident Unit, Emergency Treatment Unit, Eye Hospital, Hospital Square, and Health Ministry and to use the pavements of the Deans Road and Kinsey Road.
